product.title: Oliver & Company | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Oliver & Company

Inspired by the Charles Dickens classic Oliver Twist, this heartwarming tale chronicles the adventures of Oliver, an abandoned kitten seeking comfort and companionship on the streets of New York. After falling in with a crowd of thieving mutts, he eventually winds up getting adopted by a sweet young girl named Jenny Foxworth. Oliver’s troubles aren’t over yet, though—he still has a “rescue” and kidnapping in store! This thrill-a-minute tale teaches young readers the importance of helping those less fortunate.

Tie-in Activity: If you have a pet and your child is old enough, have your child take over full responsibilities for the care and feeding of your pet for an entire week, stepping in as needed so that your pet's needs are met. If you don’t have a pet, you can still do the activity with a stand-in--a boiled egg or "pet" fashioned out of clay putty for younger kids. See how long they can take care of their "pet" without cracking or denting it. Be sure to help them come up with a fun name for their animal.
